00042 std::string TShapeSize2DNB1::get_name() const
00043   { return "TShapeSize2DNB1"; }
00044 
00045 TShapeSize2DNB1::~TShapeSize2DNB1() {}
00046 
00051 bool TShapeSize2DNB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00052                                 double& result, 
00053                                 MsqError&  )
00054 {
00055   double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00056   double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00057 
00058   MsqMatrix<2,2> Tdelta(T);
00059   while (fabs(psi) < DBL_EPSILON) {
00060     Tdelta(0,0) += 1e-12;
00061     Tdelta(1,1) += 1e-12;
00062     frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(Tdelta);
00063     psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(Tdelta) );
00064   }
00065 
00066   result = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00067   return true;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 bool TShapeSize2DNB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00072                                           double& result, 
00073                                           MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00074                                           MsqError& err )
00075 {
00076   double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00077   double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00078 
00079   MsqMatrix<2,2> Tdelta(T);
00080   while (fabs(psi) < DBL_EPSILON) {
00081     Tdelta(0,0) += 1e-12;
00082     Tdelta(1,1) += 1e-12;
00083     frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(Tdelta);
00084     psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(Tdelta) );
00085   }
00086 
00087   result = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00088 
00089   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00090   if (psi > 1e-50)
00091   {
00092     deriv_wrt_T *= (1.0 - 1.0/psi);
00093     deriv_wrt_T -= 1.0/psi * transpose_adj(T);
00094     deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00095   }
00096   else
00097   {
00098     std::cout << "Warning: Division by zero avoided in TShapeSize2DNB2::evaluate_with_grad()" << std::endl;
00099   }
00100 
00101   return true;
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool TShapeSize2DNB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00105                                           double& result, 
00106                                           MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00107                                           MsqMatrix<2,2> second[3],
00108                                           MsqError& err )
00109 {
00110   double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00111   double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00112 
00113   MsqMatrix<2,2> Tdelta(T);
00114   while (fabs(psi) < DBL_EPSILON) {
00115     Tdelta(0,0) += 1e-12;
00116     Tdelta(1,1) += 1e-12;
00117     frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(Tdelta);
00118     psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(Tdelta) );
00119   }
00120 
00121   result = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00122 
00123   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00124   if (psi > 1e-50)
00125   {
00126     deriv_wrt_T *= (1.0 - 1.0/psi);
00127     deriv_wrt_T -= 1.0/psi * transpose_adj(T);
00128     deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00129   }
00130   else
00131   {
00132     std::cout << "Warning: Division by zero avoided in TShapeSize2DNB2::evaluate_with_hess()" << std::endl;
00133   }
00134 
00135   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_wrt_psi( second, -2.0, psi, T );
00136   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 2 );
00137   
00138   return true;
00139 }
